dao.name: QRY_HFD_ORDER_CONFIRM_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, confirm_cod, subject, content, use_cod, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_order_confirm_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_HFD_ORDER_CONFIRM_RF_USE_COD
dao.statement: select use_cod as value ,use_nam as display from email_use_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:fun_hotel_cod) and use_sta = 'Y'
